titles.title: To amend the Help America Vote Act of 2002 to delay for 48 months the deadlines by which States must comply with the election administration requirements of title III of such Act, and for other purposes.

To amend the Help America Vote Act of 2002 to delay for 48 months the deadlines by which States must comply with the election administration requirements of title III of such Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary:
Amends the Help America Vote Act of 2002 to delay for 48 months the deadlines by which states must comply with election administration requirements, including those concerning provisional voting and voting information.
Extends the availability and the period of waiver of deadline for replacement of punch card and lever voting machines.
